short_summary: Procurement of Mobile Height Adjustable Workstations
description: Mobile Height Adjustable Workstations for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans' offices in Kamloops.
tags: Cdn FTA, C Ft A, CKFTA, CHFTA, CCPFA, CHFTA
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
****Title****
Government of Canada – Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for Mobile Height Adjustable Workstations 
- Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

**Reference Information**
- **Reference Number**: WS3553532530
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3553532530
- **Publication Date**: November 22, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 12, 2022, at 14:00
- **Region of Delivery**: British Columbia

**Notice Overview**
An Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is issued to identify a pre-identified supplier for the delivery of Mobile Height Adjustable Workstations for Department of Fisheries and Oceans.

**Contract Details**
- **Project Description**: This project involves the procurement of Commercial and Industrial Furniture (UNSPSC Code: 56110000) for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans.
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
- **Expected Contract End Date**: December 12, 2022

**Notice Details**
- **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice
- **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and other relevant agreements
- **Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
- **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
- **Contact Information**:
    - **Name**: Nakade, Angela of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    - **Email**: angela.nakade@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    - **Contact Information Note**: Please direct all inquiries to the Contact above

**Related Documents**
Due to system limitations, there are no attached bids provided for this notice. 

**Disclaimer**
Note that the Government of Canada reserves the right to cancel or terminate this notice at their discretion without incurring any liability. Please monitor the Service Canada website for changes to this notice.

**Closing this Tender**
All interested suppliers can submit their statement of capabilities by December 12, 2022, 14:00 UTC. Failure to submit a statement of capabilities on or before this date may result in the Contract being awarded to the pre-identified supplier.

## Business Setup and Registration Note
Only suppliers certified for participation in Cabinet procedures may send in their statements of capabilities.
